sentences: Saleka was born in 1996 the daughter of filmmaker M. Night Shyamalan.
She studied Literary Arts and Music at Brown University and has opened for acts like Boyz II Men, Baby Rose and Summer Walker.
Upon debuting her first single, "Clarity", in September 2020, Refinery29 called Saleka "a new artist to watch".
Saleka recorded the majority of her forthcoming debut album at MIlkBoy studios, Philadelphia, the album was previously due to drop in the latter half of 2021.
